name: Beat Blocks VR
description: Beat Blocks VR is a VR Arcade Puzzle game where your goal is to assemble blocks and make best combinations to be the best player in the world. Very innovative game, you will interact directly with shapes linked to the level soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 Sandy Bridge or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Skylake or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space
